0.description: The Article namespace, also known as the main or mainspace, is where a project's primary content resides, whether articles, entries, or main documents depending on the Wikimedia project.

6.description: The Media namespace, identified as the File namespace, hosts all of a project's multimedia content, including images, videos, audio, and other media files. All files in this namespace begin with the prefix 'File:'.

10.description: The Template namespace stores Wikitext templates that are included on multiple pages, mainly through transclusion. While primarily in this namespace, some templates may reside in other namespaces, such as the User namespace.

14.description: The Category namespace organizes pages on related topics, using a MediaWiki feature to automatically list any page with [[Category:XYZ]] in its markup. This structure aids in navigation and topic discovery within a project.
